subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|府|肉|t2=ribs, flesh, body|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – decay as aspect of the flesh.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=fǔ
|c=fu6,fu2
|mn=hū/hú
|mn_note=hū - vernacular; hú - literary
|mn-t=hu1/hu7
|mn-t_note=hu7 - used in {{zh-l|*豆腐}}
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=
|cat=n,a
}}
